description: KONVA produces a full range of tuna products, from tuna in water and olive oil, to tuna salads, both Mediterranean and Mexican.
Kubo Financiero is a multi-product fintech company that offers savings accounts, personal loans, term deposits and peer-to-peer lending to customers in Mexico.
Kura Biotech is a biotech company that uses cutting-edge research techniques to equip drug testing laboratories with the most efficient enzymes.
La Zarza makes classic Mexican desserts and pastries from the highest-quality ingredients and distributes them across Mexican states through 61 self-owned and franchise stores.
Ladorian helps companies digitize advertising in brick and mortar stores.
Lanieri is an e-commerce-driven brand offering made-to-measure formal apparel for a third of the price of the traditional made-in-Italy competition. It was acquired by its major shareholder in 2019.
Latir is an advertisement company that generates omnichannel transactional and engagement experiences focused on the shopper.
Laudex offers flexible loans to students who are unable to afford private university.
Lay Bare offers a wide range of high-quality, hygienic, and affordable hair removal services in the Philippines.
LearnUpon provides clients with solutions that streamline and centralize training management across their companies to accelerate business growth.
LeaseQuery makes software that helps businesses track their leases, avoid overpaying rent and perform lease accounting.
Lemon Studios is a content creation and production company that has been putting the Mexican entertainment industry on the map.
Lemontech is a SaaS platform developing software for lawyers.

Lenddo offers its technology to financial institutions in emerging economies with high social media and mobile penetration rates, limited penetration of financial services and limited coverage of credit bureaus.

Leonali is one of the first movers within Mexico’s emerging pre-cut vegetable market, which is only expected to grow as Mexican consumers’ awareness of healthy foods increases and more steps are taken to confront the country’s obesity epidemic.
Lidyana is the leading online jewelry and accessories e-commerce company in Turkey.
Lighthouse Indonesia is the pioneer weight loss clinic in Indonesia.
Limonada provides Chile’s boys and girls with fun, innovative and fashionable clothing.
Grupo Link is a holding company that designs, executes, and optimizes digital transformation projects.
LiSim develops scoring models, which use statistics and behavioral analysis to determine the inherent risk in granting credit to a given client.
